text: The 1906 Copa del Rey Final was the 4th final of the Copa del Rey, the Spanish football cup competition. The match took place on 10 April 1906 at the Hipódromo, Madrid. The match was contested by Athletic Bilbao and Madrid CF. Madrid CF lifted the trophy for the second time with a 4–1 victory over Athletic Bilbao. ==Match details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|ATHLETIC BILBAO: |- !width=200| !!width=200| |- | Prado |- | Ignacio Allende |- | J. Irízar |- | E. Eguren |- | Tomás Murga |- | R.
